title.rendered: “Intense IDF Airstrikes Target Militants in Gaza: Key Operations and Updates”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The Air Force attacked dozens of targets throughout the Gaza Strip, eliminating dozens of militants; fighting continues in the Shuja’iyya area, central Gaza, and Rafah.

Fighters from the battalion fighting teams under the command of Division 98 eliminated several militants in close-range encounters in the Shuja’iyya area and discovered many weapons during raids in the region.
In dozens of Air Force strikes, directed by division forces, dozens of militants were eliminated and several sites for the production and storage of weaponry were destroyed.

In Rafah, fighters from the combat team of the Nahal Brigade, under the command of Division 162, identified a militant who launched an anti-tank missile at them, and in a quick loop closure, directed Air Force aircraft that eliminated the militant.

Forces from Division 99 identified a militant yesterday (Sunday) who launched an attack towards them in central Gaza; there were no casualties, and in a loop closure from the air, an aircraft attacked the militant and eliminated him.

Attached is footage from the forces’ activities in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/4bmOyWN

Attached is documentation from the IDF strikes in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/3xDiUqo

Attached are images from the forces’ activities in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC0107202465984698
